mapper.insert:
SELECT approval_SEQ.nextVal FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO APPROVAL (APP_CD, USER_CD, COMD_CD, APP_TARGET) VALUES(#{appCd}, #{userCd}, #{comdCd}, #{appTarget})
mapper.select:
SELECT T.* FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.APP_REG DESC) RNUM, LA.LECA_CD, LA.PRO_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE, LA.CRTR_MP, LA.CRTR_FP, LA.CRTR_TP, LA.CRTR_AP,
A.APP_CD, A.COMD_CD, A.APP_TARGET, A.APP_YN, A.APP_REG, A.APP_PRODT, A.APP_RET, A.APP_PCD,
P.PRO_JOIN, P.PRO_RET, P.PRO_POS,
U.USER_CD, U.FILE_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_PASS, U.USER_BANK, U.USER_DEPO, U.USER_ACC,
D.DEP_CD, D.COL_CD, D.DEP_NM, D.DEP_MRC, D.DEP_MOC, D.DEP_CRC, D.DEP_COC, D.DEP_CAP, D.DEP_TEL, D.DEP_FEE FROM LECTURE_APPLY LA, APPROVAL A, PROFESSOR P, USERS U, DEPARTMENT D WHERE 1 = 1 AND LA.APP_CD = A.APP_CD AND LA.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD AND P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND LA.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND A.COMD_CD = 'APPR02' AND A.APP_YN != 0) T

SELECT T.* FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.APP_PRODT DESC) AS RNUM, P.PR_CD, P.USER_CD, P.APP_CD, P.BD_CD, P.PR_RSN, P.PR_DETAIL, A.APP_TARGET, A.APP_YN, A.APP_REG, A.APP_PRODT, A.APP_RET, A.APP_PCD, B.BD_TITLE, B.BD_CON, B.BD_REG, B.BD_UDT, B.BD_CNT, B.FILE_CD, B.COMD_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_PASS, U.USER_BANK, U.USER_DEPO, U.USER_ACC FROM POST_REPORT P, APPROVAL A, USERS U, BOARD B WHERE 1 = 1 AND P.APP_CD = A.APP_CD AND P.USER_CD = U.USER_CD AND P.BD_CD = B.BD_CD AND A.COMD_CD = 'APPR04') T

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.APP_REG DESC) AS RNUM, -- DESC 추가하여 최신순 정렬 D.DOM_CD, D.BLD_CD, D.STU_CD, D.COMD_CD, D.DOM_YEAR, D.DOM_SEM, D.APP_CD, A.APP_TARGET, A.APP_YN, A.APP_REG, A.APP_PRODT, A.APP_RET, B.COL_CD, B.BLD_ZIP, B.BLD_ADDR1, B.BLD_ADDR2, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_PASS, U.USER_BANK, U.USER_DEPO, U.USER_ACC, S.DEP_CD, S.STU_YEAR, S.STU_SEM, S.STU_MRC, S.STU_MOC, S.STU_CRC, S.STU_COC, S.STU_ADDT, S.STU_GRDT
FROM DORMITORY D JOIN APPROVAL A ON D.APP_CD = A.APP_CD JOIN USERS U ON D.STU_CD = U.USER_CD JOIN BUILDING B ON D.BLD_CD = B.BLD_CD JOIN STUDENT S ON D.STU_CD = S.STU_CD
WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.COMD_CD = 'APPR05' ) T

SELECT A.APP_CD, A.USER_CD, A.COMD_CD, A.APP_TARGET, A.APP_YN, A.APP_REG, A.APP_PRODT, A.APP_RET, A.APP_PCD , B.CR_CD, B.ROOM_CD, SUBSTR(B.ROOM_CD, 7) || '호' ROOM_NM, B.APP_CD, B.STU_CD, B.CR_LEADER, B.CR_NM, B.CR_YN, B.CR_CON, C.USER_NM STU_NM FROM APPROVAL A, CREW B, USERS C WHERE A.COMD_CD = 'APPR03' AND A.APP_CD = B.APP_CD AND A.USER_CD = C.USER_CD AND APP_TARGET = #{appTarget} AND A.APP_YN != 0 ORDER BY APP_REG DESC

SELECT A.APP_CD, A.USER_CD, A.COMD_CD, A.APP_TARGET, A.APP_YN, A.APP_REG, A.APP_PRODT, A.APP_RET, A.APP_PCD , B.CR_CD, B.ROOM_CD, SUBSTR(B.ROOM_CD, 7) || '호' ROOM_NM, B.APP_CD, B.STU_CD, B.CR_LEADER, B.CR_NM, B.CR_YN, B.CR_CON, C.USER_NM STU_NM , D.FILE_SN, D.FILE_CD, D.FILE_PATH, D.FILE_ORNM, D.FILE_SVNM, D.FILE_EXTSN, D.FILE_CON FROM APPROVAL A, CREW B, USERS C, FILES_DETAIL D WHERE A.COMD_CD = 'APPR03' AND A.APP_CD = B.APP_CD AND A.USER_CD = C.USER_CD AND APP_TARGET = #{appTarget} AND A.APP_YN = 0 AND B.CR_CD = D.FILE_CD ORDER BY APP_REG DESC

SELECT A.CR_CD, A.ROOM_CD, A.CR_LEADER, A.CR_NM , B.USER_CD, B.APP_CD, B.APP_YN, C.USER_NM STU_NM FROM CREW A, APPROVAL B, USERS C WHERE A.CR_LEADER = B.APP_TARGET AND B.USER_CD = C.USER_CD AND B.APP_YN = 0 AND A.CR_CD = #{crCd} ORDER BY B.APP_REG

SELECT T.* FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.APP_REG DESC) RNUM, SC.SCR_CD, SC.PRO_CD, SC.STU_CD, SC.SI_CD, SC.APP_CD, SC.SCR_YEAR, SC.SCR_SEM, A.USER_CD, P.USER_NM AS PRO_NM, A.COMD_CD, A.APP_TARGET, A.APP_YN, A.APP_REG, A.APP_PRODT, A.APP_RET, A.APP_PCD, U.FILE_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_PASS, U.USER_BANK, U.USER_DEPO, U.USER_ACC, U.USER_FACE, S.DEP_CD, S.STU_YEAR, S.STU_SEM, S.STU_MRC, S.STU_MOC, S.STU_CRC, S.STU_COC, S.STU_ADDT, S.STU_GRDT, D.DEP_NM
FROM SCHLSHIP_RECOMEND SC, APPROVAL A, DEPARTMENT D, USERS U, USERS P, STUDENT S WHERE 1 = 1 AND SC.STU_CD = U.USER_CD AND SC.APP_CD = A.APP_CD AND SC.STU_CD = S.STU_CD AND SC.PRO_CD = A.USER_CD AND A.USER_CD = P.USER_CD AND S.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD) T WHERE RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} * 10) - (10 - 1) AND (#{currentPage} * 10)
mapper.update:
UPDATE APPROVAL SET APP_YN = #{appYn}, APP_PRODT = SYSDATE
WHERE APP_CD = #{appCd}

UPDATE DORMITORY SET
COMD_CD = 'PAYM01'
COMD_CD = 'PAYM02'
WHERE APP_CD = #{appCd}
mapper.select:
SELECT T.* FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY LA.LECA_CD) RNUM, LA.LECA_CD, LA.PRO_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE, LA.CRTR_MP, LA.CRTR_FP, LA.CRTR_TP, LA.CRTR_AP,
A.APP_CD, A.COMD_CD, A.APP_TARGET, A.APP_YN, A.APP_REG, A.APP_PRODT, A.APP_RET, A.APP_PCD,
P.PRO_JOIN, P.PRO_RET, P.PRO_POS,
U.USER_CD, U.FILE_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_PASS, U.USER_BANK, U.USER_DEPO, U.USER_ACC,
D.DEP_CD, D.COL_CD, D.DEP_NM, D.DEP_MRC, D.DEP_MOC, D.DEP_CRC, D.DEP_COC, D.DEP_CAP, D.DEP_TEL, D.DEP_FEE FROM LECTURE_APPLY LA, APPROVAL A, PROFESSOR P, USERS U, DEPARTMENT D WHERE 1 = 1 AND LA.APP_CD = A.APP_CD AND LA.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD AND P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND LA.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND A.COMD_CD = 'APPR02' AND A.APP_YN = 0) T
